paper.title: A deep learning-based Monte Carlo algorithm with applications in American options pricing
paper.abstract: In this article, we introduce a deep learning-based Monte Carlo method and apply it to pricing high-dimensional American options. This method keeps track of the approximating optimal stopping time and evaluates it by independent samples at each time step. The consistency and convergence rate of the algorithm are derived, which show that this method is able to circumvent the curse of dimensionality. The numerical results show that our method is efficient and accurate in pricing high-dimensional American options.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是开发一种基于深度学习的蒙特卡洛算法，并明确应用于高维美式期权的定价。论文的研究目标和应用场景直接指向衍生品定价领域。
